name: Christie Love
offering: Communication Training, Group Coaching, Mastermind Groups, Podcast Host, Presentation Skills, Public Speaking, Sales Training, Speaker Training
what_you_do: Christie Love helps professionals and business owners gain confidence in public speaking, transforming them from having stage fright to becoming effective communicators.
who_you_serve: She serves professionals and business owners looking to improve their speaking skills and confidence in front of an audience.
signature_programs: Speak To Riches Program, 5-Step Public Speaking Framework Video Course
bio: Christie Love is recognized for her mentorship in public speaking and has been featured in various media outlets.
business_focus: Christie Love helps professionals and business owners gain confidence in public speaking, transforming them from having stage fright to becoming effective communicators.
